item.title: The Love and the Care Given Makes You Eternal Not Your Bank Statement
item.description: With todayâ€™s illustration (pencil + ink pens) I wanted to represent the madness of accumulating wealth although you cannot take it with you once you are dead (the coffin). In contrast with that the shadow and some examples of taking care of someone else. The ancient Egyptians believed that the afterlife would be perfect. When they entered the afterlife, they wanted to take treasures from their life with them, and small amulets to keep them safe.
